name: SOS-Consult GmbH
goal: To provide advisory and other services to clients in Europe, inter alia, in the field of Regulatory Compliance and European Affairs as well as participation in EU stakeholder engagement.
interests: Banking and financial services, Climate Action, Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Energy, Environment, General and Institutional Affairs, Research and innovation, Single market, Trade
euInitiatives: Industrial policy, innovation, financial services and banking regulation, EU ETS phase iv (2021-30), Brexit, trade policy, regulation pertaining to environmental quality standards, resource efficiency, circular economy, waste, consumer protection, chemicals management (REACH, CLP), sustainable use of natural resources, raw materials, conflict minerals, occupational health and safety, transport of dangerous goods and products, food contact materials and construction.
